info.+content: JoJo no Kimyō na Bōken: Stone Ocean
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ストーンオーシャン

2011, Miami, Florida, USA. 19 year old Jolyne Kujoh is sentenced to 15 years in Green Dolphin Street Prison due to her involvement in an accidental manslaughter. However, shortly after her incarceration, Jolyne and some of the other inmates begin to exhibit supernatural powers known as Stands. As Jolyne makes friends and fights foes amongst the prison Stand-users, she learns that the strange circumstances behind her imprisonment may be tied to a conspiracy and its mastermind within the prison -- a shadowy figure with a grudge against Jolene's estranged father and who hopes to fulfill the ambitions of the man responsible for her family's centuries-spanning blood feud.
#1: "Stone Ocean" by ichigo from Kishida Kyōdan & The Akeboshi Rockets (eps 2-24)
#2: "Heaven's falling down" by sana from sajou no hana (eps 25-38)
アニメ「ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ストーンオーシャン」公式サイト
